actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "National Save for Retirement Week", including raising public awareness of the various tax-preferred retirement vehicles and increasing personal financial literacy.

summary.text:
Supports the goals and ideals of "National Save for Retirement Week," including raising public awareness of the various tax-preferred vehicles and increasing personal financial literacy.

Supports the need to raise public awareness of: (1) efficiently using substantial tax revenues that currently subsidize savings; and (2) the importance of incorporating financial literacy as part of understanding the need to adequately save for retirement, and the availability of tax-preferred employer-sponsored retirement savings vehicles.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "National Save for Retirement Week", including raising public awareness of the various tax-preferred retirement vehicles and increasing personal financial literacy.
